data.author: Coco Chanel
data.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.

data.author: Maya Angelou
data.quote: It’s one of the greatest gifts you can give yourself, to forgive. Forgive everybody.

data.author: Simone de Beauvoir
data.quote: Change your life today. Don’t gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

data.author: Sallie Krawcheck
data.quote: If you’re not making some notable mistakes along the way, you’re certainly not taking enough business and career chances.

data.author: Jodie Foster
data.quote: Normal is not something to aspire to, it’s something to get away from.

data.author: Todd Anderson
data.quote: Oh captain, my captain.

data.author: John Keating
data.quote: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Go ahead. Look out the window. Isn't it a beautiful day?

data.author: Bob Dylan
data.quote: People are crazy and times are strange/ I'm locked in tight, I'm out of range/ I used to care, but things have changed.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: It's a slow process, but quitting won't speed it up.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: A river cuts through a rock not because of its power but its persistence.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: The man on top of the mountain didn't fall there.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: I can and I will. Watch me.

data.author: Karim Seddiki
data.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.

data.author: Steve Martin
data.quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: The expert in anything was once a beginner.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Wake up. Kick ass. Repeat.

data.author: Jon Sinclair
data.quote: Failure is a bruise, not a tattoo.

data.author: Wiz Khalifa
data.quote: Worrying is stupid. It's like walking around with an umbrella waiting for it to rain.
